original_text: Zimri saw that Omri had taken power over the city. So he went into the strong buildings of the king's palace. He lit a fire to burn the palace all around him. Zimri himself died in the fire.
korean_text: 시므리가 성읍이 함락됨을 보고 왕궁 요새에 들어가서 왕궁에 불을 지르고 그 가운데에서 죽었으니

sentences.original_text: Zimri saw that Omri had taken power
sentences.korean_translation: 심리가 오므리가 권력을 잡았다는 것을 보았다

sentences.original_text: So he went into the strong buildings
to burn the palace all around him
sentences.korean_translation: 자신을 둘러싼 궁전 전체를 태우기 위해

sentences.original_text: Zimri himself died in the fire
sentences.korean_translation: 심리 자신도 그 불 속에서 죽었다
